sentence.Network_en: She gave him a guileless look, but he knew he couldn't really trust her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她朝他诚恳地看了一眼, 但是他知道他不能真正地相信她.

sentence.Network_en: Daphne was so guileless that Claire had no option but to believe her.
sentence.Network_cn: 达夫妮如此忠厚老实，克莱尔对她的话也只有信以为真了。

sentence.Network_en: Strong man, organ grinder, guileless giant, ever willing to be helpful.
sentence.Network_cn: 坚强的人, 器官磨床, 天真的巨人, 都愿意提供帮助.

entry.tran: 不狡诈的；老实的；厚道的
entry.def: If you describe someone as guileless, you mean that they behave openly and truthfully and do not try to deceive people.

example.ex: Daphne was so guileless that Claire had no option but to believe her.
example.tran: 达夫妮如此忠厚老实，克莱尔对她的话也只有信以为真了。
